code: import axios from'axios';import*as actionTypes from'../actions/actionTypes';var addAllTransactions=function addAllTransactions(data){return{type:actionTypes.GET_ALL_TRANSACTIONS,data:data};};export var getTransactions=function getTransactions(){return function(dispatch){axios.get("transactions.json").then(function(response){dispatch(addAllTransactions(response.data));}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);});};};export var addTransaction=function addTransaction(data){return function(dispatch){axios.post("transactions.json",data).then(function(response){console.log(response.data);}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};};
